column7: Advanced graduate project design at various scales utilizing problems of a wide range of complexity and subject matter; rural, community, and urban problems, housing, recreation, and natural areas; and emphasizes problem analysis and generation of innovative design alternatives. The student selects from several sections depending on specific interests. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 5 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: LA 534 or consent of instructor.
column9: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 5 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: LA 534 or consent of instructor.
